steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Put(number_in_box(1), into_box(3)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(9), number_in_box(2), put_result_into_box(7)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 1), number_in_box(8)), then_go_to_step(6), then_go_to_step(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 2), number_in_box(2)), then_go_to_step(1), then_go_to_step(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 2), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(7)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 2), increase(2)),
Put(number_in_box(6), into_box(3)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(8), 1), increase(2)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 3?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在3号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Put ( number in box 1 ) into box 3
Multiply: ( number in box 9 ) * ( number in box 2 ), put result into box 7.
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 8 )
Change Instruction 1: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 2 )
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Change Instruction 1: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 2
Put ( number in box 6 ) into box 3
Change Instruction 8: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 2
desc_zh: 将1号盒子中的数字放在3号盒子中
相乘：9号盒子中的数字*2号盒子中的数字，将结果放在7号盒子中。
判断：指令1中第1个盒子的编号比8号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令1：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令1中第2个盒子的编号比2号盒子中的数字大吗
判断：指令1中第2个盒子的编号比5号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令1：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加2
将6号盒子中的数字放在3号盒子中
更改指令8：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加2
